itemDescription: Recipient of the George Cross and George medal

wikipedia_page.main: Commander Geoffrey Gledhill Turner,   (10 September 1903 – 9 February 1959) was an officer in the Royal Naval Volunteer Reserve during the Second World War and a recipient of the George Cross. He is one of only eight people who have won both the George Cross and George Medal.

response: * Geoffrey Turner, former Bishop of Stockport, Diocese of Chester
